subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to lend you money
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$421,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://typinfanny.com/
